author: Andy Pearson
method: Place the rum, lime juice and sugar syrup into a cocktail shaker and shake well to combine. Pour into a Martini glass and serve garnished with a wedge of lime.
ingredients: 50ml/2fl oz white rum ,  35ml/1Â½fl oz fresh lime juice ,  4 tsp sugar syrup (often sold as 'gomme' syrup),  1 wedge lime
